item.text: Yes
No

question.title: Were you able to interpret the data presented in the Learning Analytics Dashboard easily?

item.text: Yes
No

question.title: How would you rate...
question.explanation: --- is the worst, -/+ is neutral, +++ is the best rating

item.text: the intuitiveness of navigating between database cards on the dashboard using the "START" button to access exercise areas?
the clarity and helpfulness of the progress circle in visualizing your current progress status?
the usability of the charts for providing an overview of the average time required for tasks?
the effectiveness of the charts in displaying your own count of started, correct, and executable tasks/queries?
the clarity and usefulness of the line chart displaying the number of executed queries over the last 7, 14, and 21 active days?
the usefulness of the small rating section indicating the easiest and most difficult tasks?
the effectiveness of the dashboard in assisting your learning and progress tracking activities related to database exercises?

question.title: How would you rate...
question.explanation: --- is the worst, -/+ is neutral, +++ is the best rating

item.text: the clarity and usefulness of the bar charts displaying the average time for a task across the entire course?
the effectiveness of the bar chart in displaying the average count of started, correct, and executable queries for the entire course?
the clarity and helpfulness of the pie chart displaying the average count of tasks based on a difficulty rating?
the effectiveness of these charts in providing insights into the course's performance while also considering their impact on your personal motivation?

question.title: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving the usability of our NoSQLconcepts tool?
Would you recommend our NoSQLconcepts tool to others that want to learn databases?

item.text: Yes
No

responsiveness of the component in displaying query results promptly?

question.title: What additional suggestions regarding the syntax highlighting feature do you have?
